Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Citadines Bastille Marais Paris places you in the heart of Paris, minutes from Place des Vosges and close to Notre Dame Cathedral. This residence is within close proximity of Victor Hugo's House and Bataclan.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 138 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This residence has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Citadines Bastille Marais Paris is Paris (ORY-Orly) - 14 km / 8.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Citadines Apart'hotel Paris Bastille Marais are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 14 km / 8.7 mi
Paris (CDG-Charles de Gaulle) - 20.4 km / 12.7 mi
